text: Netusomosa abaana ba Israil ennyanja olwo ne Firawo n'abawondera n'amagyege mu ngeri ey'obulabe nâ€™obulumbaganyi, okutuusa lwe yatuukibwako okuzikirira mu mazzi olwo naagamba nti: nzikirizza nti mazima ddala tewali Katonda asinzibwa mu butuufu okugyako oyo abaana ba Israil gwe bakkiriza era nze ndi mu basiramuse
